name: Backup's Here
description:
Save the Earth! Clean the oceans! My first ever published game made for the  #SeaJam. In this game, you play a little alien who felt bad for the oceans and decided to lend us a helping hand! Collect trash and fight junker ships which continue to pollute the oceans!

When you hit 30,000,000 lbs of trash collected and defeat the Boss Ship, you win the game! Be sure to keep replaying to win the two variant skins for your alien! This game will be continuously updated, so come back and check in every once-in-a-while! (aka this game may not be perfectly polished, sorry!)

Controls:
WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement
Space Bar - Use your pulse beam to destroy enemies!
Hover over trash to collect it!
